products.name: Eva 105 Haircalf Bootie
products.brandedName: Giuseppe Zanotti Eva 105 Haircalf Bootie
products.description: Introducing the stunning Giuseppe Zanotti Eva 105 Haircalf Bootie in Cheetah Print Haircalf and Silver-Tone Hardware. Elevate your style with these glamorous and creative boots that exude edge and sophistication. Crafted with impeccable Italian craftsmanship, these booties feature a convenient inner side zip-up closure for easy on and off. The lightly padded leather insole ensures all-day comfort, while the smooth leather sole provides durability and traction. With a towering 5.75-inch heel and a 1.75-inch platform, these boots add height without compromising on style. The 3.3-inch shaft and 12.25-inch boot circumference enhance the sleek silhouette. Please note that size selections are European, and for US conversions, please refer to the size chart. All measurements are approximate and were taken from a size 37; slight variations may occur. As a trusted retailer, we guarantee that our products are 100% genuine. While some items may be purchased from trusted independent suppliers, we stand by the authenticity of every product sold on our site. Step out in confidence and make a fashion statement with the Giuseppe Zanotti Eva 105 Haircalf Bootie. Order yours today and experience the allure of Italian luxury.

products.name: Black Ellia Boots
products.brandedName: Maria Luca Black Ellia Boots
products.description: "Put your left foot forward" is the concept that inspired founder Carlotta De Luca in shaping her brand, representing her spontaneous sprit. Maria Luca is where the grace of femininity and energy of masculinity meet. The brand's shoes are crafted in Italy by savvy artisans, and inspired by nonchalant and powerful women. The Black Ellia Boots are made from black calf leather and are elevated with a gold metal toecap and block heel. The perfect day-to-night style, these boots will turn heads with their sleek, sophisticated, and modern appearance. Pair with black trousers and a white button down for the office, or with a black maxi dress and gold jewelry for dinner. Pointed toe Metal toecap Gold-tone hardware High sculpted heel Ankle length Pull-on style Material: 100% Fabric (outer), 100% Calf Leather (lining), 100% Calf Leather (sole)

products.name: Dress

Crafted by the renowned brand Trendyol, this dress embodies elegance and contemporary style. Designed to make a statement, our Trendyol Dress features a stunning blue color, adding a vivid touch to your ensemble. The exquisite pattern further enhances its allure, ensuring you stand out from the crowd with confidence.With a length of approximately 43.4 inches from shoulder to hem, this dress effortlessly flatters your silhouette, making it a versatile option for various occasions. Whether you're attending a formal event or a casual outing, the Trendyol Dress guarantees a chic and polished look.To ensure optimal comfort and durability, this dress is made from 100% acrylic fabric. Its high-quality construction offers a soft and smooth feel against your skin, while the hand wash feature allows for easy care and maintenance.Imported with utmost precision, this dress showcases Trendyol's commitment to delivering impeccable craftsmanship. Each detail is meticulously crafted to provide you with a garment that exudes sophistication and timeless appeal.Elevate your fashion game with the Trendyol Dress, a true embodiment of style and grace. products.name: Le Crop Mini Boot Jean
products.brandedName: Frame Denim Le Crop Mini Boot Jean
products.description: Introducing the FRAME Denim Le Crop Mini Boot Jean, the perfect addition to your wardrobe for a dressed-up casual look with European influences. Crafted by the renowned brand FRAME Denim, these jeans offer a stylish and versatile option for your everyday ensemble.Designed in sand multicolor, these jeans feature belt loops and classic five-pocket styling, adding both functionality and flair to your outfit. With an inseam measuring approximately 26.5 inches and a front rise of 9.75 inches, these jeans offer a flattering fit that will enhance your silhouette.The leg opening has an approximate circumference of 17.25 inches, providing a comfortable and contemporary aesthetic. Whether you pair them with heels for a night out or dress them down with sneakers, these jeans effortlessly transition from day to night.Created with a blend of 79% cotton, 20% recycled cotton, and 1% elastane, these jeans offer both comfort and sustainability. The zip fly with a button closure ensures easy wear, making them a convenient addition to your wardrobe.Machine washable and imported, these jeans are designed to withstand regular use while maintaining their quality. Experience the exceptional craftsmanship and attention to detail that FRAME Denim is known for.Please note that model measurements may vary slightly by size. Embrace the timeless style and impeccable design of the FRAME Denim Le Crop Mini Boot Jean.
